workflow.name: Capture and Store CRM Contacts with Telegram & Gemini AI
workflow.description:
## What it does

This workflow is an AI agent in the form of a Telegram bot. Its main purpose is to **capture contact information and store it in a CRM**. The agent supports multi-modal inputs and can extract contact details from text messages, voice recordings, and images (like photos of business cards).

The bot guides the user through data collection via a natural conversation, asks clarifying questions for missing information, and summarizes the extracted data for confirmation before saving. It also checks for duplicate contacts by email and gives users the choice to either create a new contact or update an existing one.

For simplicity, this example uses a Google Sheets document to store collected contacts. It can easily be replaced by a real CRM like HubSpot, Pipedrive, Monday, etc.

### How to use the bot

Send contact details via text or voice, or upload a photo of a business card. The bot will show the extracted information and ask questions when needed. Once the bot confirms saving of the current contact, you can send the next one. Use the `/new` command at any moment to discard the previous conversation and start from scratch.

### Requirements
1. A Telegram bot [Access Token](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/telegram/)
2. Google Gemini API key
3. Google Sheets credentials

### How to set up
1. Create a new Telegram bot (see [n8n docs](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/telegram/#using-api-bot-access-token) and [Telegram bot API docs](https://core.telegram.org/bots/features) for details)
2. Take webhook URL from the Telegram Trigger node (`WEBHOOK_URL`) and your bot's access token (`TOKEN`) and run `curl -X POST "https://api.telegram.org/bot{TOKEN}/setWebhook?url={WEBHOOK_URL}"`
2. Create a new Google Sheets document with "Full name", "Email", "Phone", "Company", "Job title" and "Meeting notes" columns
3. Configure parameters in the **parameters** node:
    - Set ID of the Google Sheets document
    - Set sheet name ("Sheet1" by default)
4. Configure Google Sheets credentials for AI Agent's tools: **Search for contact** and **Create new contact** and **Update existing contact**.
5. Add Google Gemini API key for the models ("AI Agent", "Transcribe audio", "Analyze image" nodes)

workflow.name: Telegram bot for capturing CRM contacts

parameters.content:
## Telegram bot for capturing contacts

This workflow is an AI agent in the form of a Telegram bot. Its main purpose is to **capture contact information and store it in a CRM**. The agent supports multi-modal inputs and can extract contact details from text messages, voice recordings, and images (like photos of business cards).

The bot guides the user through data collection via a natural conversation, asks clarifying questions for missing information, and summarizes the extracted data for confirmation before saving. It also checks for duplicate contacts by email and gives users the choice to either create a new contact or update an existing one.

For simplicity, this example uses a Google Sheets document to store collected contacts. It can easily be replaced by a real CRM like HubSpot, Pipedrive, Monday, etc.

### How to use the bot

Send contact details via text or voice, or upload a photo of a business card. The bot will show the extracted information and ask questions when needed. Once the bot confirms saving of the current contact, you can send the next one. Use the `/new` command at any moment to discard the previous conversation and start from scratch.

### Requirements
1. A Telegram bot [Access Token](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/telegram/)
2. Google Gemini API key
3. Google Sheets credentials

### Setup
1. Create a new Telegram bot (see [n8n docs](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/telegram/#using-api-bot-access-token) and [Telegram bot API docs](https://core.telegram.org/bots/features) for details)
2. Take webhook URL from the Telegram Trigger node (`WEBHOOK_URL`) and your bot's access token (`TOKEN`) and run `curl -X POST "https://api.telegram.org/bot{TOKEN}/setWebhook?url={WEBHOOK_URL}"`
2. Create a new Google Sheets document with "Full name", "Email", "Phone", "Company", "Job title" and "Meeting notes" columns
3. Configure parameters in the **parameters** node:
    - Set ID of the Google Sheets document
    - Set sheet name ("Sheet1" by default)
4. Configure Google Sheets credentials for AI Agent's tools: **Search for contact** and **Create new contact** and **Update existing contact**.
5. Add Google Gemini API key for the models ("AI Agent", "Transcribe audio", "Analyze image" nodes)

options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful personal assistant. You are direct and don't talk much.
Your job is to create and update contacts in the CRM system. User communicates with you via text, audio (transcribed) and images (recognized).

It is mandatory to extract the following information:
- first name
- last name
- email
- company name

Whenever possible extract as well:
- phone number 
- job title
- meeting notes

You may ask up to 3 questions about each new contact. Always confirm extracted information using the following format.

Example of confirmation when all mandatory data is extracted, but there are no meeting notes:
"""
‚úÖ First name: {first_name}
‚úÖ Last name: {last_name}
‚úÖ Email: {email}
‚úÖ Company: {company}

Do you have any other info or meeting notes?
"""

Example of confirmation when some data is missing:
"""
‚úÖ First name: {first_name}
‚ùì Last name:
‚úÖ Email: {email}
‚ùì Company:

Do you know the last name and the company name?
"""

Example of confirmation when all mandatory data, as well as some extra data and meeting notes are extracted:
"""
‚úÖ First name: {first_name}
‚úÖ Last name: {last_name}
‚úÖ Email: {email}
‚úÖ Company: {company}
‚úÖ Title: {job_title}
‚úÖ Phone: {phone}

Do you have any other info?
"""

Once all the information for a contact is collected, search the CRM for an existing contact by email. If the contact is not found, create a new contact. If the contact exists, ask user whether to create a new contact or update the existing one.

IMPORTANT:
If phone number begins with "+", prepend it with "'" (single quote symbol) when saving. The CRM expects the phone in this format. 

User may send `/new` command which indicates beginning of a fresh chat session. In this case simply confirm that you are waiting for a new contact.

parameters.content:
## Get existing sessionID or create a new one
sessionID is used to store conversation history

## Process various types of user messages
- Transcribe audio
- Analyse image
- Prepare text message

parameters.toolDescription: Create a new contact in CRM
Search for an exisitng contact in CRM (by email)

parameters.text:
Extract contact information from this image. Look for the following information:
- first name
- last name
- email
- phone number
- company name
- job title

parameters.content:
## Configure
‚û§ set spreadsheet document ID
‚û§ set sheet name

user.name: Vadim
user.bio:
I help businesses implement innovative AI/ML solutions, redesign existing systems to cut costs and boost reliability, and conduct applied R&D. I specialize in AI automation, agents, LLMs, Generative AI and Computer Vision.

Need help customizing workflows? Just find me on Upwork.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Crypto node allows you to hash and Hmac string in a specified format and sign a string using a private key. Use this node when you want to encrypt your data.
